title: Blog of Interesting
description:
Your homepage on ZeroNet. All interesting things are listed on Site of Interesting.
All news about the site are posted in this blog.

To receive updates, please don't forget to click the Follow button.

* [Official site](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1BVGUB9cyZjUJJbRtQZmgS4YpZE1v8Nn1R/)

post.title: Site is ready
post.body:
When browsing ZeroNet, I saw lots of interesting things, but I could not find a list for this. Then I started developing **Site of Interesting** yesterday.

**Site of Interesting** is a repository/list with interesting posts/books/zites/services/apps on ZeroNet.

It now have a menu, and the list with View/Hide buttons to make the design clear:

![s1.png (1365x767)](data/img/post_2_s1.png)![s2.png (1365x767)](data/img/post_2_s2.png)![s3.png (1365x767)](data/img/post_2_s3.png)![s4.png (1365x767)](data/img/post_2_s4.png)![s5.png (1365x767)](data/img/post_2_s5.png)![s6.png (1365x456)](data/img/post_2_s6.png)![s7.png (1365x767)](data/img/post_2_s7.png)​​​​​​​![s8.png (1365x767)](data/img/post_2_s8.png)![s9.png (1365x767)](data/img/post_2_s9.png)

Added Contact (no info added yet because I'm not connected to Internet to create my ZeroID/ZeroMail/ZeroMe) and Donation heading:

![contactdonate.png (623x263)](data/img/post_2_contactdonate.png)

Todo list (will be uploaded to Nullpaste or Git Center's issues):

![todolist.png (365x357)](data/img/post_2_todolist.png)

Also added those pages: "Needed sites on ZeroNet" and "Other sites I'm developing":

![neededsites.png (829x663)](data/img/post_2_neededsites.png)![projects1.png (1365x767)](data/img/post_2_projects1.png)![projects2.png (1365x767)](data/img/post_2_projects2.png)![projects3.png (1365x767)](data/img/post_2_projects3.png)![projects4.png (1365x767)](data/img/post_2_projects4.png)![projects5.png (1365x767)](data/img/post_2_projects5.png)​​​​​​​

My suggestions for existing zites (I'll move it to Git Center as issues):

![suggestions1.png (1365x767)](data/img/post_2_suggestions1.png)![suggestions2.png (1365x767)](data/img/post_2_suggestions2.png)![suggestions3.png (1365x579)](data/img/post_2_suggestions3.png)

And the blog:

![blog.png (1365x767)](data/img/post_2_blog.png)

I'll create a Git Center's repo for this site, and I welcome all for donations and contributions on git.

Thank you for your reading, and I'm very pleased if the **Site of Interesting** is useful for you.

post.title: Welcome
post.body: To receive updates, please don't forget to click the Follow button in the blog.
